Section.Catchline: Supreme Court; bond not to be required of certain officers in certain original proceedings.

SectionBody.Text: Constitutional officers of the state, boards of county commissioners, and school boards of the several counties of this state shall not be required to furnish any bond or other security for the procurement of or to render effective any restraining order, injunction, or other order, writ or judgment in cases of original jurisdiction in the Supreme Court of Florida.
